svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/27.0.9 Chrome/134.0.6998.205 Electron/35.4.0 Safari/537.36" scale="1" border="0" version="27.0.9"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="bsd1eWPV1IOrhqHBh_l-"> <mxGraphModel dx="1412" dy="947" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="735" pageHeight="1145" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="2" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;endArrow=block;endFill=1;strokeColor=light-dark(#525252,#E9E9E9);exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" exists</font></b>" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="14" value="<font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 199, 253), rgb(0, 199, 253));"><b style="">Provider</b></font> <br><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Fetches chrootenv&nbsp;</font><div><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">packages and dependencies</font></div>" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="17" value="Build a chrootenv tarball <br>for the target OS" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#FFFFFF,#B5B5B5);fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=default;strokeWidth=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=12;" </mxCell> <mxCell id="24" value="General system configs, bootloader, user account, hostname, etc." style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#FFFFFF,#B5B5B5);fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=default;strokeWidth=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=12;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="270" y="800" width="200" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="25" value="<font><font style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77);">Security configurations, selinux, uki, immutability, etc.</font> <br><b>optional</b></font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#FFFFFF,#B5B5B5);fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=default;strokeWidth=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=12;dashed=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="520" y="800" width="200" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="26" value="<font style="color: rgb(77, 77, 77);"><font style="">Signing related operations</font>&nbsp;</font><div><b><font>optional</font></b></div>" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="520" y="900" width="200" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="27" value="Convert raw images to other required formats, vhd, vhdx, qcow2, etc."
